flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Using the Arduino UNO and a relay I'm toggling pin 9 after I receive the analog signal from the pir sensor. All three items seems to work well with each other .
guide.introduction_rendered: Using the Arduino UNO and a relay I'm toggling pin 9 after I receive the analog signal from the pir sensor. All three items seems to work well with each other .

lines.text: Using an old touch screen tablet I'm able to select either a web cam or a Arduino web server to ensure dispense executes.  I'm basically is using the Arduino LED blink example code with a flashing red led for 1500ms to dispense. Pls note the web cam is running from another computer on my home network. I'm using yawcan to stream to a page.
